titles.title: Expanding Teaching Health Centers Act of 2021
To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for additional funding for teaching health centers graduate medical education.
Expanding Teaching Health Centers Act of 2021

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary:
Expanding Teaching Health Centers Act of 2021
This bill provides funding through FY2023 to the Department of Health and Human Services to establish and expand medical residency training programs at teaching health centers.
